meanings.en: a group of people who work together on a ship, plane, or other large vehicle
meanings.vi: một nhóm người làm việc cùng nhau trên tàu, máy bay, hoặc phương tiện lớn khác
examples: The flight crew welcomed passengers aboard with warm smiles.
The ship’s crew worked through the night to repair the damage.

meanings.en: to make a serious mistake or mess something up
examples: He really crewed up that presentation yesterday.
Don’t crew this up—we’ve only got one shot.

meanings.en: a group of people working on a movie set
meanings.vi: nhóm người làm việc trong đoàn làm phim
examples: The film crew set up early to capture the sunrise scene.

meanings.en: the people who take care of passengers on an aircraft
meanings.vi: phi hành đoàn chăm sóc hành khách trên máy bay
examples: The cabin crew gave us a safety demonstration before takeoff.
